name: FARFilter
doc: A struct to serve as a filter for Asset Registry queries. (mirrored in ARFilter.h)

PackageNames: The filter component for package names
PackagePaths: The filter component for package paths
SoftObjectPaths: The filter component containing specific object paths
ClassPaths: The filter component for class path names. Instances of the specified classes, but not subclasses (by default), will be included. Derived classes will be included only if bRecursiveClasses is true.
RecursiveClassPathsExclusionSet: Only if bRecursiveClasses is true, the results will exclude classes (and subclasses) in this list
bRecursivePaths: If true, PackagePath components will be recursive
bRecursiveClasses: If true, subclasses of ClassNames will also be included and RecursiveClassesExclusionSet will be excluded.
bIncludeOnlyOnDiskAssets: If true, only on-disk assets will be returned. Be warned that this is rarely what you want and should only be used for performance reasons
